name: 蔡子萱
objective:
本課程將教導學生有關物理化學的基礎知識，並利用物理原理探討化學領域的各種現象。從氣體分子特性開始，介紹氣體動力論、熱力學理論、相平衡觀念，以及化學和電化學平衡等，並說明化學動力學計算和界面化學領域中的重要理論。

Physical chemistry deals with the principles of physics involved in chemical interactions. This course will start with gas laws, and introduce the kinetic theory of gases, the laws of thermodynamics, phase equilibrium, chemical equilibrium, electrochemical equilibrium, etc. In addition, we will also discuss the basic theories in the fields of chemical kinetics and quantum mechanics.
schedule:
Week 01-02：Gas laws & the kinetic theory of gases
Week 03-04：The Laws of Thermodynamics
Week 05-06：Gibbs Energy and Chemical Potential
Week 07-08：Quantum Mechanics
Week 09-10：Phase Equilibrium
Week 11-12：Chemical Equilibrium
Week 13-14：Electrochemical Equilibrium
Week 15-16：Chemical Kinetics
Week 17-18：Essential Math for Physical Chemistry
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam 35-40%
Final Exam 35-40%
Others (Homework, Exercise in-class & Attendance, etc.) 20-30%

若施行遠距考試，則遠距考試比例將降低；實體考試將加重。
materials:
1. David W Ball, Essentials of Physical Chemistry, Thomson 2014.
2. P. W. Atkins; J. de Paula, Physical Chemistry, 8/e, 2006.
